mapper.insert: insert into realauth (realName, sex, idNumber, bornDate, address, image1, image2, state, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id) values (#{realName}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{bornDate}, #{address}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{state}, #{remark}, #{auditTime}, #{applyTime}, #{auditor.id}, #{applier.id})
mapper.update: update realauth set realName = #{realName}, sex = #{sex}, idNumber = #{idNumber}, bornDate = #{bornDate}, address = #{address}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, state = #{state}, remark = #{remark}, auditTime = #{auditTime}, applyTime = #{applyTime}, auditor_id = #{auditor.id}, applier_id = #{applier.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: aud.id aud_id,aud.username aud_username, app.id app_id,app.username app_username
mapper.select: select r.id, realName, sex, idNumber, bornDate, address, image1, image2, r.state, remark,auditTime, applyTime, aud.id aud_id,aud.username aud_username, app.id app_id,app.username app_username from realauth r left join loginInfo aud on r.auditor_id = aud.id join loginInfo app on r.applier_id = app.id where r.id = #{id}
